description: Single storey rear extension; conversion of garage into habitable room including increase in ridge height to roof; external alterations
decision_conditions: <p>The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:&nbsp;</p><ul><li>Reasonable Exception Statement received 24/09/2024;</li><li>Location Plan entitled Drawing No: 001;</li><li>Proposed Site Plan entitled Drawing No: 11;</li><li>Proposed Ground Floor Plan entitled Drawing No: 12;</li><li>Proposed Roof Plan entitled Drawing No:13;</li><li>Proposed Elevations Plan entitled Drawing No: 14;</li><li>Proposed Elevations Plan entitled Drawing No: 15;</li></ul>

The window in the ground-floor side elevation serving the en-suite bathroom of the front bedroom shall: (a) be of purpose-made obscure glass, (b) be permanently fixed closed below a height of 1.7m above finished floor level, and shall thereafter be retained in that form.

The flat roof areas of the single storey side/rear extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the local planning authority.

The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development and/or any making good, hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building and/or specified materials within the submission documents.

The development hereby permitted shall
be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
